Test Name: Inherited Congenital Myasthenic Syndrome (CMS) Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Blood (3â€“5 mL), saliva, or fresh/frozen tissue
Purpose: Detection of pathogenic variants in genes associated with congenital myasthenic syndrome for accurate diagnosis and patient management.
Container: EDTA tube for blood, saliva collection kit, or sterile container for tissue
Equipment: Next-generation sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina) with associated DNA extraction and library preparation systems
